actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: One Bite and two Claw. If it hits one creature with two attacks creature takes 14 (4d6) bludgeoning damage and must make DC 15 Con save or be stunned until end of its next turn.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 11 (1d8+7) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 14 (2d6+7) slashing damage.

bonus_actions.name: Versatile Coat
bonus_actions.desc: White fur white to brown vice versa.

special_abilities.name: Dismembering Strike
special_abilities.desc: If it scores a critical hit vs. stunned creature tears off one of creature's limbs. Creature is immune to this if it is immune to slashing.

special_abilities.name: Forest and Snow Camouflage
special_abilities.desc: Advantage: Dex (Stealth) checks to hide in forest terrain if fur is brown and snowy terrain if fur is white.
